node.title: India Blockchain Alliance
node.excerpt: IBA was established with the purpose of mutual assistance in the field of business development, networking, cooperation and defending the interests of the members of the alliance.

node.title: V
node.excerpt: A statically typed programming language similar to Go that offers fast compilation, simplicity and maintainability while providing great performance.

node.title: 2021 Review, 2022 Preview

node.title: 3Bot Connect renamed to ThreeFold Connect
node.excerpt: As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.

node.title: April 2022's ThreeFold Product Updates
node.excerpt: ThreeFold V3.0.0 Alpha-5 is officially released with upgrades and improvements to various TF Grid componenents. Dig in!

node.title: DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold’s decentralized Grid
node.excerpt: The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned – both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.

node.title: Announcing DigiThree Labs

node.title: Harmony Integrates with ThreeFold’s Decentralized Grid
node.excerpt: Harmony and ThreeFold will work together on developer and user projects on the ThreeFold Grid and Pangaea..

node.title: How ThreeFold Provides a Secure IT Ecosystem

node.title: Paradise Hills Property Development and ThreeFold to Establish the World’s First Neighborhood Cloud in Dubai
node.excerpt: ThreeFold and Paradise Hills join forces to bring the world’s largest decentralized Internet Cloud powered by the ThreeFold Blockchain into Homes.

node.title: ThreeFold partners with SKALE to empower its developer community
node.excerpt: SKALE and ThreeFold are excited to announce their collaborative partnership that will focus on solving scalability and decentralization limitations faced by Ethereum and Blockchain developers.

node.title: A First Look at Terraform on TF Grid 3.0
node.excerpt: A demo on how easy it is to create, use, and destroy deployments on TF Grid 3.0 using Terraform.

node.title: Introducing TF Chain and Updated Billing
node.excerpt: Learn about TF Chain, the importance of blockchain within ThreeFold, and updated pay-as-you-go billing in TF Grid 3.0.

node.title: Presenting the new Explorer UI for Grid 3.x
node.excerpt: The updated Explorer brings a simple interface and true decentralization to the way compute, storage, and network capacity information is sourced from 3Nodes.

node.title: All About ThreeFold Grid 3
node.excerpt: As the team is working hard on bringing ThreeFold Grid 3 to mainnet, we wanted to remind you of what's new and what's coming!

node.title: TFT is more accessible; now available via PancakeSwap and a BTC Integration on ThreeFold Connect
node.excerpt: Today, the bridge to BSC is live, making TFT available on PancakeSwap! And anyone can now buy TFT with BTC directly on the ThreeFold Connect app.

node.title: ThreeFold partners with Hewlett Packard Enterprise
node.excerpt: Dubai, UAE, Today at GITEX Technology Week, ThreeFold signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)

node.title: ThreeFold Now Marketplace is coming soon!
node.excerpt: ThreeFold Now Marketplace is a peer-to-peer alternative to centralized cloud providers, enabling you to deploy independently and keep ownership of your own data. 🙌 Read more within.

node.title: ThreeFold and Presearch partner to decentralize search nodes and storage
node.excerpt: Privacy and decentralization are some of the values shared by both Presearch and ThreeFold, at the core of their missions to create scalable technologies..

node.title: Zetako and ThreeFold Join Forces
node.excerpt: Zetako and ThreeFold join forces to enable hyper-efficient data transport and storage for people and for our planet

node.title: TomoChain & ThreeFold are joining forces to decentralize Cloud Computing
node.excerpt: TomoChain will invite their developer community and anyone interested in contributing to the TomoChain Blockchain, to connect and use the Threefold Grid.

node.title: Validator Node Update
node.excerpt: In support of the establishment of ThreeFold’s DAO we have officially opened registrations for the first L2 and L0 validators.

node.title: Bridges Connecting the ThreeFold Ecosystem to External Networks
node.excerpt: Since the launch of ThreeFold Grid 3.0, TFT is now available on three blockchains – Stellar, Binance Smart Chain and the Substrate-based ThreeFold Blockchain (aka TF Chain).

node.title: Solving the Blockchain Dilemma
node.excerpt: Blockchain technology has the power to change the world of IT. There are a huge number of new initiatives using blockchain technology around the world, with countless use cases.

node.title: This ThreeFold Farm Keeps Veggies Warm
node.excerpt: Somewhere in the Netherlands, a ThreeFold Farm is supporting the growth of vegetable crops such as tomatoes, peppers and cucumbers.

node.title: What Bitcoin did to money, ThreeFold is doing to the Internet
node.excerpt: As the Internet is struggling with issues due to its centralized model, ThreeFold spent the last six years developing a new open-source peer-to-peer Internet infrastructure from the ground up.

node.title: Building a New Internet From the Ground Up – Part 4: Network
node.excerpt: We're (finally) back with part 4, looking at the networking aspects of the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: Building a New Internet From the Ground Up – Part 3: Compute
node.excerpt: Part three of an approachable series on the inner workings of the ThreeFold Grid. This time, we're exploring compute.

node.title: Can a 'Democratized' Internet exist in times of a Cyber War?
node.excerpt: With cyber sovereignty turning into a non-territorial challenge to sovereignty itself irrespective of the virtual realm of the internet, is there a way out for humanity?

node.title: How ThreeFold Can Truly Decentralize Blockchain
node.excerpt: Is a blockchain truly decentralized if it is being hosted on a centralized solution? We say, no.

node.title: Decentralizing the Internet
node.excerpt: In this article, we discuss the general concept of a ‘decentralized grid’ and how anyone can plug-in capacity to the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: Edge Cloud, not Grid Cloud

node.title: An escape from the Great Hack
node.excerpt: I can’t help but think how unfair it is that in today’s digital society, people are being treated like products, because there is no such thing as a ‘free’ platform without YOU being the product.

node.title: Building the Future We Want to Live In – A Four Step Journey
node.excerpt: Driven by our planet-first, people-first philosophy, the ThreeFold movement is shaping the world we want to live in and laying the foundation for an open, inclusive and abundance-based future.

node.title: ThreeFold's Long Story Short
node.excerpt: The truth is that ThreeFold is a big project. Here we will try to make things a little simpler for you.

node.title: Response - The Internet is Destroying Our Brains, but We Can't Quit
node.excerpt: A response to a poignant article written by P.E. Moskowitz on the dangers of today's Internet.

node.title: The Internet is Moving to the Edge
node.excerpt: With emerging technologies like IoT, Web 3 and more, computing needs to be pushed from centralized data centers to the edge of the network. Learn why ThreeFold is the ideal foundation for a thriving interconnected future.

node.title: Interview – Designing Solutions for a P2P Future
node.excerpt: An interview with Jonas Delrue from Jimber, the team developing P2P solutions like video chat and office workspace, using the Digital Twin platform. Digital Twin is a use case on top of the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: The need for ThreeFold's neutral internet
node.excerpt: The Internet is no longer the neutral place it used to be. +80% of the Internet capacity is delivered by a handful of companies.

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Two: Akash
node.excerpt: This post is the second one in a series to explore fellow projects and their solutions with regards to what they share with ThreeFold but also where we differ. Follow me on my journey through the space. This time, we're looking into Akash!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part One: Dfinity
node.excerpt: This post is the first one in a series to explore fellow projects and their solutions with regards to what they share with ThreeFold but also where we differ. Follow me on my journey through the space. First up – Dfinity!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Four: Storj
node.excerpt: Follow me to the fourth stop on my journey through the space. This time, we’re looking into Storj!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Three: Filecoin
node.excerpt: This post is the third one in a series to look into fellow projects and their solutions to better understand the space we operate in and how ThreeFold stands out. This time, we're taking a closer look at Filecoin!

node.title: Our Quest to Fully Decentralize the Internet
node.excerpt: It's our mission to transform the Internet and Cloud. Learn more about the status quo and how we're working on fully decentralizing the entire Internet!

node.title: A new approach to the Internet Architecture
node.excerpt: The Edge internet needs a different approach. So, we started as from scratch and shaped a totally new approach..

node.title: Introducing the TF (Chain) Admin Portal – for farmers and grid users!
node.excerpt: Last week, we shared an update on what's new in TF Grid 3.0.1 – and the path to mainnet! There's been a lot of exciting progress by the team, and we wanted to share more details with you, starting with the admin portal!

node.title: A Smart Contract for all IT workloads
node.excerpt: The Smart Contract for IT allows you, your company or your community to execute the storage and running of your files and applications securely with consensus and automatic billing.

node.title: The ThreeFold Blockchain
node.excerpt: The third release of the ThreeFold Grid represents a major step in the decentralization of the People’s Internet with the Smart Contract for IT coming to life on the ThreeFold Blockchain (aka “TF Chain”).

node.title: The ThreeFold Grid 3.x Explorer UI
node.excerpt: The Explorer was designed to provide a simple way for anyone to find decentralized Internet capacity on the ThreeFold Grid, and we’re thrilled to announce a new user interface for Grid 3.x on both testnet and devnet!

node.title: Why is ThreeFold P2P Cloud the better solution for customers than Amazon Web Services or Microsoft Azure?
node.excerpt: As we’ve recently been exploring decentralized projects to see where ThreeFold is in the space and where we stand out, we thought it’s a good time to also look into how we compare to traditional, centralized cloud providers.

node.title: ThreeFold’s Planet Positive Plan
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is taking not just a sustainable approach, we’re setting the plan for a planet positive Internet.

node.title: ThreeFold’s 2021 Review and 2022 Preview
node.excerpt: It was an important year for ThreeFold, with huge developments on the ThreeFold Grid, the continued expansion of the grid by farmers, key partnerships, and more – all setting up for a strong 2022!

node.title: What Is Peer-to-Peer and Why Is It so Important?
node.excerpt: P2P systems are network, not linear or pyramidal hierarchies (though they may share some elements)..

node.title: Zero People IT is the Future
node.excerpt: Classic IT infrastructure setup is complex and is not cost-effective. Applications need a specific environment to operate in, built by integrating different technology components from different vendors. Elements of such a setup are operating systems, storage systems, networks, security systems, authentication systems, and more.
